Description: Excellent condition, rarely played, just one of many of my collection. I just have not played this one much, and I got the itch to by another couple guitars, so I'm selling off a few that I don't play often. Which means the winning bidder is going to get basically a new guitar for a used price. Finish: Gloss - Top Material: Flame Maple Laminated; 3-layer - Body Material: Laminated Maple; 3-layer - Neck Material: Mahogany - Neck Shape Options: 1960's SlimTaper D-profile - Neck Joint: Glued-In - Truss Rod: Adjustable; Dual-Action - Truss Rod Cover: 2-layer; Black/White; "Les Paul ES" in White - Scale Length: 24.75" - Fingerboard Material: Pau ferro with "Trapeze" Pearloid Inlays - Nut: White Synthetic Bone - Headstock Inlay: "Epiphone" logo in Pearloid - Neck Pickup: Epiphone ProBucker-2 - Bridge Pickup: Epiphone ProBucker-3 - Knobs: Gold RidgeTop "top hat" knobs with metal pointers Controls - 3-way Pickup Selector with White toggle cap - Neck Pickup Volume with coil-splitting - Bridge Pickup Volume with coil-splitting - Neck Pickup Tone - Bridge Pickup Tone Binding - Top: (1-layer); Pure White - Fingerboard: (1-layer); Pure White - Headstock: None - Body Back: (1-layer); Pure White - Fingerboard Radius: 12" - Pickguard: Cream - Frets: 22; medium-jumbo - Bridge: Epiphone LockTone Tune-o-matic - Tailpiece: Epiphone LockTone Stopbar - Nut Width: 1-11/16" - Hardware: Nickel - Output Jack: Epiphone Heavy-Duty, Non-Rotating 1/4" with Square Jack Plate - Machine Heads: Grover Rotomatics ;
Title: Epiphone Les Paul E S Pro
